original_text: The Bible says, ‘God has caused his Spirit to live in us. He wants very much to keep us for himself.’ Do you think that is not true?
korean_text: 너희는 하나님이 우리 속에 거하게 하신 성령이 시기하기까지 사모한다 하신 말씀을 헛된 줄로 생각하느냐

sentences.original_text: God has caused his Spirit to live in us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그의 영이 우리 안에 거하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He wants very much to keep us for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 자신을 위해 간직하기를 매우 원하십니다

sentences.original_text: Do you think that is not true
